Title: Login
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion

Title: See assigned groups
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices

Title: Logout
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click profil > click logout

Title: Access device manager
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices

Title: Edit vpn configuration
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click access-configuration > click preview-configuration-panel > click configure-vpn

Title: Edit devices configuration
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click access-configuration > click preview-configuration-panel > click configure-settings-related-to-device

Title: Edit customer configuration
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click access-configuration > click preview-configuration-panel > click configure-customer

Title: Edit network configuration
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click access-configuration > click preview-configuration-panel > click configure-network

Title: Edit devices role selection
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click access-configuration > click preview-configuration-panel > click configure-settings-related-to-device > click edit-roles

Title: Build configuration
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion >  click access-configuration > click preview-configuration-panel > click build-configuration

Title: See unstagged list
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click unstagged-devices-list

Title: Remote stage device as ORBP5
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click unstagged-devices-list > click  role > select orbp > click number > select 5 > click staged

Title: Ping any device
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click one-group-device > click one-device > click possible-action(s) > click reboot > click confirm

Title: Ping all devices
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click select all > click possible-action(s) > click ping

Title: Check any device sheet
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click one-group-device > click one-device > click possible-action(s) > click show-details

Title: Turn off vpn access for a device
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click one-group-device > click one-device > click possible-action(s) > click show-details > click toggle-vpn-acces-off

Title: Turn on vpn access for a device
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click one-group-device > click one-device > click possible-action(s) > click show-details > click toggle-vpn-acces-on

Title: Access restaurant healthcheck
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click healthcheck

Title: Restart any device
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click one-group-device > click one-device > click possible-action(s) > click restart

Title: Reassign any POS printer
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click group-pos > click one-device-pos > click possible-action(s) > click printer-swap > click confirm > click choose-an-option >  choice printer-pos1 > click apply-modifications

Title: Reset any non-fiscal device
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click one-group-device > click one-device-non-fiscal > click possible-action(s) > click reset > click confirm

Title: Reset any fiscal device
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click one-group-device > click one-device-fiscal > click possible-action(s) > click reset > click confirm

Title: Search for a specific device
Steps: click log-in > click merim-staff > entrer user > enter password > click connexion > click detected-devices > click Manage-Devices > click on the search bar >  write the specific device in the search bar
